__e: You have security, and a duller life nobody ever led.
You know, the thing about working in a hospital... is if you don't have a funny black friend , things get pretty boring. Vanilla Bear!
You know why? 'Cause I need to do these things. 'Cause you fucking bore me!
Really it's more of a boredom thing, an emptiness, really.
Why did you bother giving me the intel if you were gonna bust out anyway?
Now...we're machines... Fighting boredom in a dull job. Without interest or purpose...
The last thing Clark feels when he thinks about you is boredom.
That's not the right thing to say.
Always for me, sometimes out of boredom, and one time for you.
